docs/getting-started.html.title: Getting Started | RWAchievement
docs/getting-started.html.keywords: Getting Started Prerequisites This guide assumes that you know how to create a basic mod for Rain World (or already have), and modify JSON files. If you do not know how to create a Rain World Mod, you can follow the Slugbase tutorial for a basic tutorial, and then come back here. Custom Achievements In order to create a custom achievement for your mod, first create a folder called achievements and inside of that create a file called myachievement.json

index.html.title: Welcome to the Rain World Achievement mod Documentation. | RWAchievement
index.html.keywords: Welcome to the Rain World Achievement mod Documentation. This mod's primary purpose is to provide an alternative way of viewing your Steam achivements, and additionally serve as a single unified place for other mods to add their own. To use it, simply install the mod from Steam or the GitHub for non-Steam downloads of the game. If you are here, then you probably want to add achievement compatability with your mod, be it a custom campaign or region. Follow the guide here to get started.
